title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 and new AirPods Max colors could launch this fall
content:
Back when Apple released the iPhone 7, many people complained about the company’s decision to remove the headphone jack. However, Apple also launched the original AirPods as an alternative to using the Lightning dongle, because of which users slowly started adapting to wireless earbuds. For many people, switching back to the wired solution is now

The post Apple AirPods Pro 2 and new AirPods Max colors could launch this fall appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple could potentially be launching the AirPods Pro 2 in addition to new AirPods Max colors this upcoming fall, according to a new report.
